title: Ismael Rosero’s CV
text:
973-1293 | isma.rosero1@gmail.com | linkedin.com/in/ismael-rosero-6260aa240




January 2022 – Present
Brigham Young University – Idaho, Rexburg, ID
Bachelor of Science in Business Finance
- Minor: Business Analytics
- Expected Graduation: Winter 2026
- Relevant Coursework: Advanced Financial Management, Investments, Business Analytics, Financial Modeling, Data Science Programming, SQL, Statistics




Data Tools & Analysis: Power BI (DAX, KPI tracking, dashboards), Tableau (visualizations), Excel (XLOOKUP, PivotTables, charts, financial modeling)
Programming & Automation: Python (pandas, NumPy, matplotlib), R (ggplot2, dplyr), SQL (joins, subqueries), VBA (automation)
Statistical & Analytical: Regression analysis, hypothesis testing, data wrangling, forecasting, API integration
Languages: Spanish (Native), English (Fluent)




2023 – Present
Shipping Scheduler, Done Right Installation Group LLC – Salt Lake City, Utah
- Maintained accurate inventory and project data by cross-referencing work documents, achieving 100% data reliability
- Updated and maintained reporting spreadsheets in Excel/Google Sheets, improving clarity and accessibility for the team
- Coordinated technician schedules, optimizing routes and reducing delays
- Managed customer communications via email/phone, ensuring accurate scope of work and improved client satisfaction
2021 – 2022
Ad Administration, Web Net Soluciones – Cuenca, Ecuador
- Ensured accurate and timely payment for services provided by maintaining detailed records and following up on outstanding invoices
- Administered customer web pages and managed payment processing, ensuring smooth and efficient operations
- Created effective publicity banners for customers, improving online presence and engagement




2018 – 2019
Part-Time Volunteer, Orphanage Support Services Organization – Cuenca, Ecuador
- Monitored and analyzed weekly expenditures for multiple orphanages, ensuring accurate budget tracking and identifying areas for cost savings
- Organized schedules and coordinated activities for volunteers, improving operational efficiency
2019 – 2021
Full-Time Volunteer, The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints – Kampala, Uganda
- Supervised and trained 220 volunteers across multiple regions, coordinating schedules and reporting systems
- Conducted leadership training meetings and workshops, strengthening organizational effectiveness
- Adapted to a new cultural environment, developing communication and problem-solving skills

title: YouTube Trending Analysis (Tableau)

YouTube Dashboard


Dashboard analyzing trending YouTube channels — including days trended, max views, and category insights.
Skills used: Tableau, Exploratory Data Analysis, Visualization



 Back to top

title: Do Sleep and Exercise Help School Performance?
text:
Sleep Project Overview


Overview:
This R project analyzes whether students who sleep more or exercise regularly perform better academically.
The analysis uses a dataset of 10,000 student records, exploring how sleep duration and exercise frequency relate to academic performance.


Data Overview



Sleep Graph 1


This graph shows how average performance scores vary across different sleep durations.



Results



Sleep Graph 2


Students who sleep between 7–9 hours and exercise consistently tend to have higher academic scores.



Conclusion



Sleep Conclusion


Students with better sleep habits and regular exercise show improved academic outcomes.
While correlation doesn’t prove causation, these findings suggest healthy habits contribute to school success.

Tools used: R, ggplot2, tidyverse, Quarto
Note: The full interactive version is available on BYU–Idaho’s Shiny server (login required).

title: Orphanage Donations Consulting (R)
text:
Overview
This consulting analysis helped a non-profit orphanage better understand donation behavior and improve campaign performance.
Using R and ggplot2, the analysis visualized donor trends, identified patterns in donation frequency, and recommended specific strategies to increase recurring donations.
Key Insights - 60% of donations came from repeat donors. - Education and food campaigns received the highest contributions. - Recommendations helped optimize outreach timing for better engagement.
Skills used: R, ggplot2, dplyr, Data Storytelling, Consulting Analytics
📂 Download Report: View HTML Report



 Back to top

text:
Netflix Dashboard


An interactive Tableau dashboard exploring Netflix titles by country, rating, genre, and year added.
Skills used: Tableau, Data Cleaning, Dashboard Design, Data Storytelling



 Back to top

title: Crypto Markets Email Bot (Excel VBA)
text:
Crypto Table


Overview
This Excel VBA automation retrieves live cryptocurrency market data, analyzes returns, and sends email alerts when price thresholds are met.
It’s designed to help investors monitor multiple coins in real time — directly from Excel.
Features - Pulls BTC, ETH, DOGE, DOT, and BNB prices. - Calculates performance over multiple time frames (1h, 24h, 7d, etc.). - Sends auto-generated reports via Outlook or Gmail. - Includes dynamic charts for quick visual tracking.
Dashboard Preview
 
Skills used: Excel VBA, Automation, APIs, Email Integration, Data Visualization
📂 Download Excel File: Crypto_Model_Ismael_Rosero.xlsm

title: Welcome
text:
Hi, I’m Ismael Rosero. I’m a senior student at Brigham Young University–Idaho majoring in Finance and with a minor in Business Analytics. This site is my Data Science Portfolio, where you’ll find my resume and a collection of projects that show my skills in data cleaning, exploration, and visualization.
